# BlazorUI Component Library - LLM Documentation

**For LLM Agents:** This project uses comprehensive, structured documentation.

## ðŸ“– Read This First
**https://raw.githubusercontent.com/blazorui-net/ui/main/llms/index.txt**

The index.txt file contains:
- Complete component reference (30 components with links to detailed docs)
- Installation and setup instructions
- Usage patterns and real-world examples
- Icon library documentation
- Architecture patterns

## ðŸ“š Documentation Structure

- **Main Index:** https://raw.githubusercontent.com/blazorui-net/ui/main/llms/index.txt
- **Setup Guide:** https://raw.githubusercontent.com/blazorui-net/ui/main/llms/setup.txt
- **Component Docs:** https://raw.githubusercontent.com/blazorui-net/ui/main/llms/components/{component-name}.txt
- **Usage Patterns:** https://raw.githubusercontent.com/blazorui-net/ui/main/llms/patterns.txt
- **Icons:** https://raw.githubusercontent.com/blazorui-net/ui/main/llms/icons.txt

## ðŸš€ Quick Start for LLMs

1. Read the index.txt (main reference)
2. For installation help, read setup.txt
3. For specific components, follow links in index.txt
4. For multi-component examples, read patterns.txt

---

**Project:** BlazorUI - Blazor component library based on shadcn/ui
